snippet.title: Crashy Laps - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2257410?utm_source=jandu&utm_medium=youtube

#playstation 
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008603

#nintendoswitch 
https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/crashy-laps-switch/

#xbox 
https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/crashy-laps/9mtrtfxmnb7k

Crashy Laps is an arcade racing game, with all the track visible on the screen, designed for playing in Single Player and Local Multiplayer modes. Based on classic games, there are isometric and top-down selectable camera views.

Crashy Laps is a game to enjoy driving and overtaking aggressively where collisions and foul play are common, with a maximum of 4 Players. 20 little and funny tracks are waiting for you. In Single Player mode, you can also compete to reach the Best Time in the Leaderboard of each track.

Features

- Use one or more Gamepads 🎮, or Keyboard ⌨️: you can use Keyboard for playing a maximum of 2 players at the same time.
- 4 Settings for each part of day: Morning, Midday ☀, Evening 🌄 and Night 🌛.
- 4 Competitions: Time Trial, Quick Race, Grand Prix and Championship.
- 4 Areas with their own settings: road grip, environment, terrain types, etc.
- 4 Tracks for each Area: 16 Tracks + 4 Track variants.
- 3 AI 🤖 Difficulties: Novice, Professional and Expert.
-2 selectable Camera Views: Isometric or Top-down.
- 2 selectable Engine Sounds: Combustion or Electric.
- Customization: customize the number and the car colours.

More information:
https://www.jandusoft.com/crashylaps
